import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from 'react'; import "./style.css"; import Select from 'react-select'; import {ContextConsumer} from '../../utils/Context' const AddressElement = () => { const contextValues = useContext(ContextConsumer); if( contextValues.user_address[0] ) { console.log("user : " , contextValues.user_address[0].full_name ) if(contextValues.user_address[0].full_name==="name") { // history.push("/address"); } } const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({}); const handleChange = (event) => { const name = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value; setInputs(values => ({...values, [name]: value})) } return (

) } export default AddressElement;
